title: Stvru
author: Stvru
content: Aviator predictor telegrame channel : @predictorxadmin app to estimate 1xbet crash game is true or scam app please help i need to activate

comments.author: Ever-young
comments.body: Anything 1Xbit is likely to be scam so be very careful. 1Xbit are known scammers in this forum so anything relating to them could be considered scam, if you can’t avoid them entirely I will advice you proceed with caution and bare in mind that you might lose anything that you put in their either if you pay for their service or gambling with their sites which ever one you devised to do.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: Don't ever involved yourself in 1Xbit casino site they are there to scam people, at first they will do as if they are legit but at the end they scam you and deactivate your account from their database. So you better leave that scam site now before it will be too late. When you go to the Scam Accusation Board you will see many scam accusation thread on their head which they could not defend and there is pinned thread there too so you can there and read those threads. Steer clear from 1xbit, they are scammers.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: well, in your post I see two things that are scams, firstly this application that keeps lying about predicting the results of the aviator game, that's a lie. Don't believe that, that aviator game depends on luck and you won't have any app to make you win in that game and be aware that by using these scam apps you put yourself at a lot of risk on your computer or phone and you will also be cheating in the game aviator, this could get you banned, I assume you don't want to be banned and you don't want to expose the security of your devices so don't use any app that says it will allow you to win in the aviator gameYou also just need to think about it this way: if there was a person who had an app to cheat on the aviator, do you think that person would promote this app? This person would be rich in a few days and the aviator game would go bankrupt, so don't believe these lies they keep saying, these apps are all lies and scams. now there is another serious problem: 1xbet, despite being a site that is in many countries around the world and sponsoring major leagues, they are a scam site, do not use 1xbetIf you want to continue playing Aviator, then play without cheating (without using these scam apps) and look for a trustworthy site in your country that has the Aviator game and don't use 1xbet because they are a scam casino. These are my two pieces of advice and I hope you research what I'm talking about and make a good decision so you don't lose money and don't get banned, and in extreme cases you could even be arrested if you cheat at Aviator while using a casino in your country

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: Stvru on September 18, 2023, 09:01:50 PMAviator predictor telegrame channel : @predictorxadmin app to estimate 1xbet crash game is true or scam app please help i need to activate The title of your thread made it sound like you have tested the system and confirmed that it really works and now you’re here to promote it to other forum members…I don’t know if it’s possible to predict a game that’s purely based on luck but even if others claim that they have I still won’t trust the bot and another thing, just as the post above mine have stated you should look out for 1xbet site, they have been connections to 1xbit.com which has so many scam accusation threads that have been opened against them and up till now they still remain unattended to.

comments.author: Sanitough
comments.body: Quote from: Stvru on September 18, 2023, 09:01:50 PMAviator predictor telegrame channel : @predictorxadmin app to estimate 1xbet crash game is true or scam app please help i need to activate The app is a scam, and the gambling site is questionable. The crash game inherently has a house edge, so there's no way to win consistently using a system. Your only chance of winning is through luck, and realistically, you can't predict that either. So, my advice is not to complicate things and not to easily fall for what you read. When something seems too good to be true, it's often a scam.

comments.author: Kakmakr
comments.body: You have the perfect combination for a scammers paradise, namely "Telegram / 1xbet / Predictor App" ....so be careful. The "Aviator" game work on a CLIENT seed and a SERVER seed and a RNG (Random number generator) and the same seed are used for all the players that are playing the game. (shared seed) Every single bet stand on it's own, it does not remember the previous bets, but the RTP will favor the house in the long-run. So, no APP can calculate the outcome of future bets, based on the bets that has been done in the past.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: I think you have got the answer now from friends here, but it is good that you ask like this so as not to use the wrong casino and never visit the 1xbet site, you can visit their ANN on this forum and they have come out to be scammers and are tagged on this forum by the community, everyone on this forum will definitely try to keep beginners like you away from sites like this to avoid fraud.I think you need to close this thread if you feel like you've gotten enough answers and immediately stay away from anything related to 1xbet because their site is not really good to visit let alone play on that site, as a recommendation you can visit ANN from other gambling sites that are better trusted on this forum and better than 1xbet

comments.author: Outhue
comments.body: Predictions are simply nothing but predictions, if anyone is telling you to join telegram group for gambling predictions just know that you are taking a huge risks..1. They might be scammers waiting to take advantage of you. 2. They might predict right at first and make you pay some money for premium service, only to find out later that it's not worth it. Also 1xbet or 1xbit has no good reputation on this forum, please and please stay away from them, they are scammers pretending to have the good minds for people, and many fools on the forum still promote the scam casino, they ended up getting their accounts painted in red.When you are talking about a Red Flag, well, 1xbit is the closest to red flag that you need to know, if you want to start a legal crypto gambling, seek advice on this forum and stay away from any telegram groups.

comments.author: Wapfika
comments.body: Quote from: Stvru on September 18, 2023, 09:01:50 PMAviator predictor telegrame channel : @predictorxadmin app to estimate 1xbet crash game is true or scam app please help i need to activate It’s scam, There’s no way such app exists that can predict the result of a complete random game. Just like other crash game, There’s no way to predict the outcome of a crash game unless you have access on the source code of the game itself.Anyone selling this kind of tool instead of using them by themselves is obviously a scam not mentioning that the casino involved here has a bad reputation here in the forum.

comments.author: Crypt0Gore
comments.body: When it comes to gambling, there is no living soul that knows what the outcome of a bet will be, all they have is to predict, meaning they are just like yourself, relying on nothing that prediction, so why can't you get this done yourself? Also if anyone can predict the future, they will be the richest person on the earth, more richer than Elon Musk and many other Billionaires, all they have to do is gamble and keep winning on every existing casino online and offline. So ask yourself, why are those claiming to be good at this looking for people? If they are really good at it they should be swimming in money and they won't teach anyone their secret, wake the *uck up newbie. Just to remind you, 1xbit are scammers and that have been proven so many times on this forum.

comments.body: Quote from: Reatim on September 19, 2023, 06:31:51 AMQuote from: Stvru on September 18, 2023, 09:01:50 PMAviator predictor telegrame channel : @predictorxadmin app to estimate 1xbet crash game is true or scam app please help i need to activate The Name of 1xbet is already Scam , so what more the Prediction or admin predictor?if the site is already a proven scam , so everything connected to its name is surely a Scam.and also Telegram is full of scammers inside , better to be careful or better to not deal by this in any chances.the answers from members already have one stand and that is to Please stay away from this or be a victim tomorrow .There is a strong thing about domain name. Once a domain name is corrupted, it is very hard to be redeemed again. In this forum, anything about 1xbit and 1xbet is a scam, no matter whatever means, you cannot successfully market the above brands again in the forum. At the worse scenario, you will be tagged doing that. So, for the safety of your account and the safety of your name, it is advisable you stay away from 1xbit and 1xbet.

comments.author: Webetcoins
comments.body: First of all, what makes you think that a bot or a person can be able to predict the outcome of a game when the results are generated through a random number generator? Do you really think that someone can predict what number the generator will provide next? That's not something possible, and even if someone can get one or two correct outcomes, that will totally be coincidental and that wouldn't mean that the person or the bot is managing to predict the outcomes successfully.And, there are a bunch of trusted and reputable casinos out there that have the same game, why would you choose a casino that has such a bad name in the community and a lot of scam accusations from its former users that it scams users and doesn't pay what they owe them? Please avoid using the predictor and also 1xbet or 1xbit if you don't want to give away your money to someone for free.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Quote from: Stvru on September 18, 2023, 09:01:50 PMAviator predictor telegrame channel : @predictorxadmin app to estimate 1xbet crash game is true or scam app please help i need to activate It is a scam, OP. Those are always a scam.Any services which offers to you some kind of advantage over other gamblers, asks you for money or some kind of subscription and takes places on Telegram, are 100% a scam.Besides, of that 1xbet and 1xbit are also quite shady services which are supposed to be avoided at all cost, so please, if you are being sincere about this question of yours in "service", then take our word and stay away.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: When you get an invite on telegram always be vigilant against cheating , if the telegram owner is not a scammer then fellow users on that group is likely will work to scam you. So I stay off from telegram handles if I can't verify if it is an official handle. Having said that, 1xbet and 1xbit looks like birds of same feather, it didn't have a good review and reputation here so I'm sure most users will advise to stay clear from it , if actually you are not trying to promote what you posted .
